A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I love Star Wars\, it is my absolute favorite movie franchise.  To see what happened in this movie to such a beloved galaxy of interesting\, beautiful\, and meaningful stories and myths. In just under three hours everything I grew up loving about Star Wars was either 1.thrown away 2.made fun of 3.broken to the point of no return. My only hope is that this won't become a trend\, having meaningless stories that have no purpose deeper than having pretty CGI sequences.
